sources.title: Absolute Deception | Full Movie | Action Crime Thriller | Cuba Gooding Jr
sources.description:
*Absolute Deception*  - When a widowed reporter teams up with a Federal Agent to solve the mystery of her deceased husband Milesâ€™s double life, a big time crook is released from jail and comes looking for the money that Miles stole from him. The reporter and FBI agent are stuck in the crossfire, while romance blossoms in this thrilling story of deception, fear, and lies.
2013.  Stars: Cuba Gooding Jr., Emmanuelle Vaugier, Evert McQueen

metadata.Plot: A widowed reporter recruits the help of a federal agent to investigate her late husband's secrets, but the two become the target of unknown attackers.
metadata.Writer: Jeffrey Schenck, Peter Sullivan, Kraig Wenman
metadata.Actors: Cuba Gooding Jr., Emmanuelle Vaugier, Evert McQueen
